metadata.title: CVE-2018-17960 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
CKEditor 4.x before 4.11.0 allows user-assisted XSS involving a source-mode paste.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-17960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ckeditor - 4.11.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

notes.note: litios> No specific patch was found

criterions.comment: ckeditor package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.11.1+dfsg-1').
